name: ParinamaAcademy
0:
”Alexa ask learning center to check in”
”Alexa ask learning center to check out”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learning center
des:
Parinama Academy Accountability Service

Whenever a kid comes to our center, we will check in using the bot and send SMS to notify to the parents. Similarly, when they leave the class we will check out using the bot and send another SMS to notify the parents.

We will be adding more features and functionality soon!
